name: Occult Bracelet
description: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.

abilities.name: Rites of Eloshar
abilities.description: Each time the wearer is attacked they gain a stack of 0.4 mana regen, up to 5 stacks. Stacks last for 5 seconds.
notes: Rites of Eloshar can give at most 2 mana regeneration bonus
With max stacks and its duration, it can regenerate up to a total of 10 mana
Each stack places a new hidden modifier buff on its wielder. This means their durations are independent from each other
The number of stacks can be seen on the status buff icon

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
